name: Beyond the Veil (itch) (alxl, kylepo)
description:
Made for MoonJam 2022 Q1

In this puzzle game, you will play as two unlikely companions: a human and a ghost. First, as the ghost, you set up gadgets to help the human spot where the malicious spirits are. Then, as the human, navigate the rooms and avoid the ghosts that you can't see.

By PWEGG
---
Kyle Oge
alxl
Crystal Torres
